name: ng-formio
description: The form redering engine behind Form.IO.

scripts.build: babel ./src --ignore=*.spec.js --out-dir ./lib --presets es2015,stage-2; webpack --config config/webpack.dev.js; webpack --config config/webpack.prod.js
scripts.tagbuild: VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]');npm run build;git add -A; git commit -m "Build $Version";git push origin 3.x;git tag v$VERSION;git push origin --tags
scripts.build-windows: babel ./src --ignore=*.spec.js --out-dir ./lib --presets es2015,stage-2 && webpack --config config/webpack.dev.js && webpack --config config/webpack.prod.js
